author: hship
msg: Change Vlib and TapestryDemo to configure for WebLogic SP 4.
Update Vlib documentation, include fixing CLOUDSCAPE_INSTALL.

author: hship
msg: Update for change to ApplicationServlet / SimpleApplication.
Remove unneeded application classes and rewrite ApplicationServlet subclasses.
Update the Tutorial to match the new code.
Fix bad Page link in the simple tutorial code (was linked to "home" not "Home").

author: hship
msg: Simplify ApplicationServlet; have it load and hold the specification.
Remove some specification related methods from AbstractApplication.
Fix a minor bug in BaseComponent (NullPointer thrown if component has template but no embedded components).

author: hship
msg: Convert demo databases (SessionTracker and VlibBeans) to use Cloudscape 3.5.

author: hship
msg: Adjust Example code around recent bug fixes.
Add cleanupPage() methods to Vlib application pages that need to remove EJBs.
